"Big news! Big news!":
"It has been confirmed that never-seen-
before Hostiles are present at the
Ruins area!"

"Is that an armour? Rumour has it that
they are equipped using very rare
materials!"

"Now that you know, you're concerned,
aren't you? So here's my request! I
hope you can collect those materials!
"

"遺跡エリアで今まで見たことのない
エネミーが確認されたんだって！"

"鎧っていうのかな？　武装してて
すごく珍しい素材ってウワサだよ！"

"そう聞くと、やっぱり気になるよね？
ってわけで、お願い！
その素材を集めてきてほしいな！"
